update.description:
Tweak target areas and spawn points so that there's always enough room for the robot to drop off a guest and then exit. Also place island cubicle chairs tighter close to the desks.

![area2.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/gkR8znK/images/1301824641-area2.png)

## Image

* red: each target area
* blue:  target area's minimum point
* green: target area's maximum point
* orange: point within an area where robot or guest is spawned

## Rooms

Room | Area | Point
-- | -- | --
Small meeting room | 3 x 3 m, always without obstacles | Within area, padding = 1.0 m
Large meeting room | 3 x 3 m, always without obstacles | Within area, padding = 1.0 m
Small office | 3 x 3 m, always without obstacles | Within area, padding = 1.0 m
Large office | 3 x 3 m, always without obstacles | Within area, padding = 1.0 m
Refreshment area | 3 x 3 m, always without obstacles | Within area, padding = 1.0 m
Bathroom | 3 x 1.5 m, always without obstacles, outside of room | Within area's center line
Public cubicles (island) | 3 x 3 m, includes the desk and chair | Near area's outer corner
Public cubicles (corners) | 3 x 2 m, always without obstacles | Close to area's outer edge
Front / back / private cafe areas | minimum 2.25 x 2.25 m, always without obstacles | Within area, padding = 1.0 m
Private cubicles | 1.8 x 1.5 m, always without obstacles, outside of cubicle | Within area's center line
update.title: Make room

content.raw: Thanks ! much better now. I didnt try it extensively but it seems to make things smoother
content.html: Thanks ! much better now. I didnt try it extensively but it seems to make things smoother

content.raw:
Thanks! Addressed on e4aeee9:

* No idle actors should ever be inside the red areas, I moved them
* Let's leave the meeting room as it is for now and focus on solving an easier chackpoint. We can leave them as a challenge for competitors or address it later.
* That was my mistake, removed the debug visuals
* Made it smaller:

![newfront.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/gkR8znK/images/3862484610-newfront.png)
content.html:
Thanks! Addressed on e4aeee9:

  • No idle actors should ever be inside the red areas, I moved them
  • Let's leave the meeting room as it is for now and focus on solving an easier chackpoint. We can leave them as a challenge for competitors or address it later.
  • That was my mistake, removed the debug visuals
  • Made it smaller:

update.title: Make room

content.raw:
Thats great! I played with this a bit:

 * The idle actor in the lobby very often ends up "in the way" of very close to the guest that make things pretty challenging
 * The additional room in the meeting rooms is nice but doesnt seem to be sufficient to drop the guest in a place where it doesnt block the exit preventing the robot from completing the task
 * The world file commited in this PR has all the debug visuals, it has 2 inconvenients: the laser picks up these boxes so the robot is "surrounded by obstacles" and it impacts the realtime factor
 * The front elevator area is still much bigger than the other ones, is it on purpose?
content.html:
Thats great! I played with this a bit:

  • The idle actor in the lobby very often ends up "in the way" of very close to the guest that make things pretty challenging
  • The additional room in the meeting rooms is nice but doesnt seem to be sufficient to drop the guest in a place where it doesnt block the exit preventing the robot from completing the task
  • The world file commited in this PR has all the debug visuals, it has 2 inconvenients: the laser picks up these boxes so the robot is "surrounded by obstacles" and it impacts the realtime factor
  • The front elevator area is still much bigger than the other ones, is it on purpose?
